comment: @elonmusk @politico Hunter Biden might be our best hope for making hard drugs legal just to keep him out of jail.
To those misunderstanding what he’s saying, he’s NOT agreeing to debate @RobertKennedyJr.  He’s just offering to come on my show by himself.
original_tweet: Are you sure I’m not a part of a coalition with neofascist leanings?  Seems like that’s what you really think, or what you’re projecting to the masses. https://t.co/2fzZax57aR https://t.co/dJVsvefZun
